original_text: I appeared to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, as God Almighty, but by my name the Lord I did not make myself known to them.
korean_text: 내가 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 전능의 하나님으로 나타났으나 나의 이름을 여호와로는 그들에게 알리지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: I appeared to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob,
but by my name the Lord
I did not make myself known to them.
